Package runner

Class WeatherPolygonPainter

java.lang.Object
runner.WeatherPolygonPainter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColorByElevation, ColorByLatitude, ColorByLongitude
public abstract class WeatherPolygonPainter
extends java.lang.Object
A WeatherPolygonPainter is used to color GeographicPolygons using a certain coloring scheme.
Author:
Anton Ballmaier

    • WeatherPolygonPainter

  • Method Details

    • hslToRgb

      protected static int[] hslToRgb​(float h, float s, float l)
      Color conversion from HSL to RGB colors.

      Hue, saturation and lighness are expected to be from the interval [0, 1].

      Parameters:
      h - the hue from the interval [0,1]
      s - the saturation from the interval [0,1]
      l - the lightness from the interval [0,1]
      Returns:
      the RGB representation of the given hsl color, where r, g, b are from the interval [0,255]

    • hueToRgb

      private static float hueToRgb​(float p, float q, float t)
      Helper method used to convert hue values to RGB color space
      Parameters:
      p - the intermediate result p used to compute the rgb value
      q - the intermediate result q used to compute the rgb value
      t - the required hue shift dependent on the color to calculate
      Returns:
      the (floating point) r, g or b value resulting from the given parameters

    • to255

      private static int to255​(float v)
      Helper method used to map the interval [0,1] to a [0,255] int range. This is used to quantize colors.
      Parameters:
      v - the value
      Returns:
      the mapped value

    • colorOf

      public abstract int[] colorOf​(GeographicPolygon poly)
      Assigns a color to a given GeographicPolygon.
      Parameters:
      poly - the GeographicPolygon to color
      Returns:
      the color of the given GeographicPolygon
